task_description: A web application that allows users to create, edit, and delete notes.

modules.module_description: Handles the creation, editing and deletion of notes, and manages interactions with local storage.

user_requirement_list.user_requirement_description: Users should be able to add a new note by clicking the 'Add note' button.

test_cases.test_case_name: Add a new note with the button click
test_cases.test_case_description: Verifies that clicking the 'Add note' button adds a new note input area.
test_cases.expected_result: A new note area is displayed with an editable text area.

user_requirement_list.user_requirement_description: Users should be able to edit an existing note after it has been created.

test_cases.test_case_name: Toggle edit mode of a note
test_cases.test_case_description: Verifies that clicking the edit button toggles between display and edit mode for a note.
steps: Add a new note using the 'Add note' button.
Click the edit button on the note.
test_cases.expected_result: The text area should be visible while the displayed note is hidden.

test_cases.test_case_description: Verifies that any text inputted in the text area is reflected in the display once the user exits edit mode.
steps: Click the edit button again to exit edit mode.
test_cases.expected_result: The updated text should display correctly in the note display area.

user_requirement_list.user_requirement_description: Users should be able to delete existing notes.

test_cases.test_case_description: Verifies that clicking the delete button removes the note from the display.
steps: Click the delete button on the note.
test_cases.expected_result: The note should be removed from the display.

user_requirement_list.user_requirement_description: User's notes should persist even after refreshing the page.

test_cases.test_case_name: Check notes persistence across page refresh
test_cases.test_case_description: Verifies that the notes persist in local storage and are displayed after refreshing the page.
test_cases.expected_result: The previously added note should still be visible after the refresh.

user_requirement_list.user_requirement_description: The application should handle cases where a note is empty or deleted.

test_cases.test_case_name: Attempt to save an empty note
test_cases.test_case_description: Verifies that saving an empty note results in no display on the notes section.
steps: Do not enter any text in the text area.
test_cases.expected_result: No note should be displayed since there is no content.

user_requirement_list.user_requirement_description: Handle invalid data input and provide user feedback when errors occur.

test_cases.test_case_description: Verifies the layout and usability of buttons after adding multiple notes.
steps: Add multiple notes by clicking 'Add note'.
Observe the layout of buttons and text areas.
test_cases.expected_result: All buttons should remain clickable and the layout responsive regardless of the number of notes.
